message: This is my initial offer.  I want to get the majority of the money.  I hope you'll accept, but I'm prepared to negotiate.
Alice, your initial offer was quite bold! I'm proposing a more equitable split this time. Let's not let greed shrink our potential gains.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the difference and go with a 60/40 split in my favor.  I think this is a fair offer that we can both agree on.
